newsArray.title: Real Madrid boss Ancelotti 'calm' about tax fraud accusations
creator: The Straits Times
newsArray.description: March 07, 2024 1:51 PMReal Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti said he was calm about accusations he avoided 1 million euros ($1.09 million) in taxes on image rights revenues while he was at the club in 2014 and 2015.

newsArray.title: UCL: Guardiola names two teams they are competing against for trophy
creator: Ifreke Inyang
newsArray.description: Manchester City manager, Pep Guardiola, has said they are competing with Real Madrid and Bayern Munich in the Champions League. Guardiola stated this after a 3-1 win over FC Copenhagen in their Round of 16 second leg. City have now qualified for the quarter-final of the competition with a 6-2 aggregate score. Speaking after the […] UCL: Guardiola names two teams they are competing against for trophy

newsArray.title: Football: près de cinq ans de prison requis contre Carlo Ancelotti pour fraude fiscale
newsArray.description: Le parquet de la région de Madrid a décidé de réclamer quatre ans et neuf mois de prison contre l'entraîneur italien du Real Madrid Carlo Ancelotti, qui doit être jugé prochainement en Espagne pour fraude fiscale.
